title: The Seduction
description:
Dr. Athena Carswell is on the brink of making time travel possible - until the Department of Defense sends Colonel Peter Grafton to oversee her work. The hot young officer is a serious distraction, especially when his psychic abilities reveal their mutual attraction!However, there are others interested in Athena's work, too - people who will use any force necessary to get their hands on her research. But when it comes to protecting Athena, nothing will stand in Peter's way...not even time itself.
An eBook-exclusive prequel to the TIME RAIDERS series from Silhouette Nocturne!
author: Cindy Dees
